scheme_name: Karkhandar Scheme For Development Of Craft Sector
description: The Karkhandar Scheme in Jammu and Kashmir provides skill upgradation training to women artisans in languishing crafts to revive traditional crafts and promote self-employment.

benefits.training: Free skill upgradation training for 3-6 months
benefits.stipend: Monthly stipend during training, up to Rs. 2,000

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Jammu and Kashmir
occupation_criteria: Must be engaged in traditional crafts

eligible_activities: Training in crafts like embroidery, weaving, or woodwork
Producing and marketing traditional craft products

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Handicrafts Department
Submit the application with proof of craft experience
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the department
Selected artisans are enrolled in training programs

special_notes: Priority is given to artisans from rural areas
Artisans must participate in exhibitions post-training
